data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Ang Thong, Thailand that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ang Thong, Thailand
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Ang Thong, Thailand to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Ang Thong to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Ang Thong, Thailand.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Han Chinese, Cantonese people might believe through him.
Spirit, cause the 2,060 believers in Ang Thong to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, help the 2,060 believers in Ang Thong to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 316,540 lost friends and neighbors.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 2,060 believers in Ang Thong, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

location.name: Ang Thong
location.people_groups_list: Aheu Luang, Japanese, Han Chinese, Hakka, Huay, Mlabri
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Aheu Luang (1,600), Japanese (71,000), Han Chinese, Hakka (79,000), Huay (600), Mlabri (90)
